name: Tangy Winter Squash and Bean Chili
description: A hearty veggie twist on a comforting favourite.

ingredients.name: peeled, seeded and diced acorn or butternut squash

preparation: Heat Multipurpose Pot to medium; add vegetable oil and sauté onion and Minced Garlic until soft, about 4 minutes.
Add squash and cook a further 5 minutes, stirring regularly.
Add beans and Salsa Mix. Stir in tomato and orange juice and bring to a gentle simmer.
Reduce heat to low, add chipotle chili and simmer for 15–20 minutes, or until flavours are combined and squash is tender. Season with Sea Salt and Black Pepper before serving.

products.name: Minced Garlic
summary: Full, bold, garlic flavour. No chopping required.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chillies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
